about.summary: Fast, parallelized implementation of principal component analysis for molecular dynamics data with constant memory consumption for large data sets.

commands: fastpca -h 2>&1 | grep -q "Calculate principle components from large data files."
fastpca -h 2>&1 | grep -q "Calculate principle components from large data files."
fastpca -h 2>&1 | grep -q "Calculate principle components from large data files."

name: fastpca
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "FastPCA" %}
{% set version = "0.9.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/moldyn/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 67aebbbfb637f8a0fdb1ae130e3f457b3a21fc982cb99de7e61b4fe03dcbd0ae

build:
  number: 1
  skip: True  # [win or osx]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake

  host:
    - boost-cpp
    - libblas
    - libcblas
    - liblapack
    - liblapacke

  run:
    - boost-cpp

test:
  commands:
    - fastpca -h 2>&1 | grep -q "Calculate principle components from large data files."

about:
  home: https://github.com/moldyn/fastpca
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Fast, parallelized implementation of principal component analysis for molecular dynamics data with constant memory consumption for large data sets. '
  doc_url: https://github.com/moldyn/fastpca
  dev_url: https://github.com/moldyn/fastpca

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - simonbray
